name: NCH-1 Monterey Vibe
details:
Uni-VibeRecreate classic uni-vibe style effects in 60's, can be used as chorus, rotary speaker or phaser pedal.
By using a powerful 32bit float point DSP, we modernized the complex physical phenomena of 4-stage phaser based on a pulsating bulb surrounded by 4 photoresistors.
Ultra low noise, high performance 96kHz/ 24bit A/D and D/A converters; 100dB typical dynamic range.
120% (+3dB) boost level when your crank up the volume knob.
Supports buffer bypass or true bypass selection to get the best performance; with micro USB port for firmware upgrade.
